reviewText: I like most of the new outer limits.
Nice, but surprisingly politically-correct for way back then. Typical Hollywood political bent. But entertaining.
The descriptions of episodes are all messed up. The pages need to be fixed!
Love this show.  I watched this since it's first run on prime time television

It took me forever to find this episode! I first watched this episode as a teenager on tv and though I only saw it once I never forgot it. I don't want to post any spoilers but I love the relationship dynamics in this episode as well as the hope that is implied at the end. Definitely worth the watch!

Excellent updated version of a TV classic.

Relevant story lines that are as meaningful today as they were when the series came out, if not more so as both our technology and culture becomes more complex.
I wish this was available in HD but still a classic
A little different compared to regular dead head tv.

I purchased this whole season. Because The Outer Limits was such a good show. But there is one episode in particular that I was ecstatic to now own. Stream Of Consciousness is the episode. The fist time it aired, after it ended I sat there for a good hour wowed by its meaning. But now in todays world, the message in that episode is even more powerful than it was in 1997.
One of my favorite episodes from the Outer Limits. I am so pleased that I can now watch this series on Amazon.
Just as good as the Twilight Zone; better SFX
